name: getLegoByTheme
query:
SELECT
    l.Id,
    l.Name,
    l.Price,
    l.Image,
    JSON_ARRAYAGG(
        JSON_OBJECT(
            'Id', t.Id,
            'Name', t.Name
        )
    ) AS Theme
FROM
    Lego l
JOIN LegoTheme lt ON
    l.Id = lt.LegoId
JOIN Theme t ON
    t.Id = lt.ThemeId
WHERE t.Id = {{Id}}
GROUP BY
    l.Id,
    l.Name,
    l.Price,
    l.Image;
